comment: по клику на труп Крика скверны

languages.text: Множество ударов измяло броню чудовищного хелбрута по прозвищу Крик скверны. Последний удар топора расколол его изрисованный зловещими глифами череп.
A multitude of blows dented the armour of the horrific Helbrute known as Doomscream until the final axe blow split open his glyph-covered skull.
languages.original_text: Множество ударов измяло броню чудовищного хелбрута по прозвищу Крик скверны. Последний удар топора расколол его изрисованный зловещими глифами череп.

traits.locale_text: A multitude of blows dented the armour of the horrific Helbrute known as Balescream. The final axe blow split open his glyph-covered skull.
A multitude of blows dented the armour of the horrific Helbrute known as Balescream. The final axe blow split open his glyph-covered skull.
A multitude of blows dented the armour of the horrific Helbrute, known as Balescream, until the final axe blow split open his glyph-covered skull.

A multitude of blows dented the armour of the horrific Helbrute known as Doomscream until the final axe blow split open his glyph-covered skull.

languages.text: 这头被称为“灾啸”的恐怖地狱兽护甲已经被砸得凹了下去。太空野狼奋力砍下最后一斧，劈开了他满是巫术咒文的头颅。
languages.original_text: A multitude of blows dented the armour of the horrific Helbrute known as Doomscream until the final axe blow split open his glyph-covered skull.

traits.locale_text: 这头被称为“灾啸”的恐怖地狱兽护甲已经被砸得凹了下去。太空野狼的最后一斧，劈开了他满是巫术咒文的头颅。

languages.text: L'armure de l'abominable Métabrutus surnommé Fléau Hurlant porte les traces des nombreux coups essuyés au cours du combat, qui s'est achevé lorsqu'une hache a fendu en deux son crâne couvert de glyphes.
languages.original_text: A multitude of blows dented the armour of the horrific Helbrute known as Doomscream until the final axe blow split open his glyph-covered skull.

traits.locale_text: L'armure de l'abominable Métabrutus porte les traces des nombreux coups qu'elle a essuyés au cours du combat, qui s'est achevé lorsqu'une hache a fendu en deux son crâne couvert de glyphes.

languages.text: ドゥームスクリームと呼ばれる恐ろしいヘルブルートのアーマーは複数の打撃によりへこんでおり、斧による最後の一撃でグリフに覆われた頭蓋骨はかち割られた。
languages.original_text: A multitude of blows dented the armour of the horrific Helbrute known as Doomscream until the final axe blow split open his glyph-covered skull.

traits.locale_text: ドゥームスクリームと呼ばれる恐ろしいヘルブルートのアーマーは複数の打撃によりへこんでおり、斧による最後の一撃でグリフに覆われた頭蓋骨はかち割られた。

languages.text: Numerosos golpes han logrado abollar la armadura del espantoso Bruto Infernal conocido como Doomscream hasta que el último hachazo le ha abierto el cráneo cubierto de glifos.
languages.original_text: A multitude of blows dented the armour of the horrific Helbrute known as Doomscream until the final axe blow split open his glyph-covered skull.

traits.locale_text: Numerosos golpes han logrado abollar la armadura del espantoso Bruto Infernal conocido como Balescream hasta que el último hachazo le ha abierto el cráneo cubierto de glifos.

languages.text: Eine Vielzahl von Hieben hat die Rüstung des grauenhaften Höllenschlächters namens Unheilsschrei eingedellt, bis der letzte Axtschlag seinen mit Glyphen bedeckten Schädel gespalten hat.
languages.original_text: A multitude of blows dented the armour of the horrific Helbrute known as Doomscream until the final axe blow split open his glyph-covered skull.

traits.locale_text: Eine Vielzahl von Hieben hat die Rüstung des grauenhaften Höllenschlächters namens Unheilsschrei eingedellt, bis der letzte Axtschlag seinen mit Glyphen bedeckten Schädel gespalten hat.

languages.text: Art arda gelen darbeler, Belanarası adıyla bilinen dehşet verici Tamu Kaçkını'nın zırhına hasar vermiş. Ancak canavarın işini bitiren, gliflerle kaplı kafatasına inen bir balta darbesi olmuş.
languages.original_text: A multitude of blows dented the armour of the horrific Helbrute known as Doomscream until the final axe blow split open his glyph-covered skull.
